1112.5868v1.title: Infinity norm bounds for the inverse of Nekrasov matrices
1112.5868v1.summary:
From the application point of view, it is important to have a good upper
bound for the maximum norm of the inverse of a given matrix A. In this paper we
will give two simple and practical upper bounds for the maximum norm of the
inverse of a Nekrasov matrix.

1803.04524v1.title: A note on non-inclusion "interval" root solvers
1803.04524v1.summary:
In this note we give comments on recent interval extensions of the
King-Ostrowski multipoint methods for solving nonlinear equations published in
at least five scientific journals offering faulty "self-validated" methods. We
show that they do not possess essential feature of genuine interval methods --
inclusion property.

0901.2949v1.title: Hyperbolic Volume of Link Families
0901.2949v1.summary:
For families of knots and links given in Conway notation we compute lower
maximal and upper minimal bound of hyperbolic volume by using source links and
augmented links.
